page.title: 03DORNIE PRIMARY SCHOOL.
page.content: Our school lies on the eastern shore of Loch Long in the village of Dornie.It consists of two classrooms separated by a busy road.There are 29 pupils in the school,20 boys and 9 girls and there are two teachers. One class has the children from primary 1 to 4 and the other 5 to 7. The school starts at 9.30am and finishes at 4.pm.There are breaks in the morning for half an hour, lunch time for an hour and then in the afternoon for 15 minutes. Lunches which are made in Lochalsh School are served in the canteen which is part of the school house. There are no playing fields at the school,just two tarred playgrounds and a small grassy patch. Games are therefore limited.
